https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qNOEaTR3LqI04r2pd3VkuYUztkh.jpg Adopt A Sailor is about Patricia and Richard, a successful and hip couple from New York City who inadvertently "adopt a sailor" during Fleet Week in New York City and the young man form Turkey Scratch, Arkansas who changes their lives forever.
